bill.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendments to the House amendment to the bill (S. 2938) to designate the United States Courthouse and Federal Building located at 111 North Adams Street in Tallahassee, Florida, as the "Joseph Woodrow Hatchett United States Courthouse and Federal Building", and for other purposes; providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the bill (S. 2089) to amend the Families First Coronavirus Response Act to extend child nutrition waiver authority, and for other purposes; relating to consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 4346) making appropriations for Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2022, and for other purposes; and for other purposes.
bill.description: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendments to the House amendment to the bill (S. 2938) to designate the United States Courthouse and Federal Building located at 111 North Adams Street in Tallahassee, Florida, as the "Joseph Woodrow Hatchett United States Courthouse and Federal Building", and for other purposes; providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the bill (S. 2089) to amend the Families First Coronavirus Response Act to extend child nutrition waiver authority, and for other purposes; relating to consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 4346) making appropriations for Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2022, and for other purposes; and for other purposes.

history.action: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-385, by Mr. McGovern.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 84.
Considered as privileged matter. (consideration: CR H5883-5915)
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1204.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 204 (Roll no. 297). (consideration: CR H5883-5915)
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 203 (Roll no. 298). (text: CR H5883)
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
